title: Intelligence Analyst (Volunteer)
content: Spearhead production of OSINT-backed intelligence reports and articles to counter disinformation while working with a wide range of stakeholders in the military, intelligence, law enforcement, activist, and media communities

title: Litigation Paralegal
content: Collaborate with industry-leading clients and stakeholders in the residential real estate sector;Counsel over ten clients daily on their legal matters regarding responsibilities to tenants under the Residential Tenancies Act;Analyze case law, video evidence, witness statements, and other forms of disclosure to prepare for hearings on multiple files;Advocate on behalf of clients on a handful of hearings to negotiate favourable settlements with tenants and opposing counsel during mediation and hearings
